creditline: Lent by Fred and Ellen Wells
description: black and white; snow-covered landscape with house in middleground on left; Inscriptions: "Snow in Nakazato", in pencil, LL; "Hiroshi Yoshida", in pencil, LR; unstanslated inscription, vertical along LL edge; unstranslated inscription over image in LR corner; red seal over image in UR corner
marks: \"Hiroshi Yoshida\", in pencil, LR; unstanslated ins \"Snow in Nakazato\", in pencil, LL
title: Snow at Nakazato
